import Layout from "../Layout"; export default function FAQ() { return (

General

What is YFAC?

The Youth Financial Analysis Competition (YFAC) is an annual, online event that promotes financial literacy for teens. YFAC puts a greater emphasis on qualitative analysis than quantitative analysis so that participants of all skill levels may enter. Participants are engaged in a mock financial analyst-client setting based on a selection of case studies we have designed. The case studies feature real-world companies. Participants will be required to: Identify strengths and weaknesses of a company, Be able to come up with an in-depth analysis, Compile spreadsheets with key data taken from a company’s financial reports, Work individually or as a team, Submit their analyses in the form of pdf document.

How much prior experience is required?

No prior experience with financial analysis, economics, or business is required to participate. Participants are provided with a Case Brief that contains basic resources, as YFAC is designed to be both a competition and a learning opportunity.

{" "} Who can participate in YFAC 2022?

To qualify for YFAC 2022, participants must be aged 13-18 at the time of submission (Aug. 31st)

{" "} What is the schedule for YFAC 2022?

The following schedule is recommended for YFAC 2022: September 10th-30tht: Contest open. Participants may submit their analyses at any point between these two dates. October 7th: Top 3 finalists announced. October 14th: Elevator pitch presentations by top 3 finalists. Ambassadors awarded, and winners announced.

{" "} Where and how will the events take place?

YFAC 2022 is 100% online. The participants will send in their solutions via a pdf document, and the top 3 finalists will be invited to present to a live panel of judges.

{" "} Registration{" "}

How much does it cost to enter?

Entry to YFAC 2022 is completely free. There are no associated costs with the competition.

Can I enter as an individual if I don’t have a team?

Yes. Participants may enter individually.

{" "} How big do the teams have to be?

Participants can apply in teams of 2-4. There is no restriction on which regions each team member is from.

Can more team members be added after initial registration?

No. All team members must register together. After initial registration, additional team members cannot be added.

How do I sign up under the name of my ambassador?

At the bottom of the registration form, you should see a drop-down menu that allows you to select the name of your ambassador.

{" "} During the competition

What is the submission process for YFAC 2021?

Upon registration, participants will receive an email on the format of submissions and other submission requirements.

How many different case study options are available?

Participants can select one out of five case studies to analyse.

); }
